name: Eversmann et ux., Appellants, v. Balkey

judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Justice Eagen and Mr. Justice Roberts dissent.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Eversmann et ux., Appellants, v. Balkey.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Eagen and Mr. Justice Roberts dissent.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Eversmann et ux., Appellants, v. Balkey.
Argued September 30, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Charles D. Coll, for appellants.
Max U. Applebaum, for appellees.
April 20, 1972:
